title: In two games at once?
body: well i was in a game and during the game i was attepmting to recconect before the possible surrender time. i then closedall my sutff to re open it and reconect but found only a normal client witch let me q for nanother game. i dont know if this has happend before but pls tell me ur thoughts or a soultion and pls dont ban me or give me a loss for this riot for i was winning the game before this happend.

replies.body: That previous game might have completely crashed and ended before you were able to get back in. If it did crash, no worries. It's a pretty rare occurrence and you won't receive any penalties for it.
